::Zardus/FZ/DevilDuer/Shredder/Striker/Prowl::

Zardus jumps back from the explosion while FZ and DevilDuer get blown into walls. Zardus growls, looking out of the blown out door.

"Get rid of that mess." He tells Dracona and walks off.

DevilDuer struggles to his feet. "The next predacon I see is going to die. Just for that." He says and storms off to a CR chamber.

FZ falls from the wall he had been blown into to the floor, in stasis lock.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Shredder nods and shakes Quickstrike in an attempt to wake him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker arrives at the maximal base. He had been too late for the recent battle. He walks up to Prowl. "What's up?"

Prowl looks up. "Liono's meeting with Iron Raptor and Plintissa. Other than that, nothing major."

Striker nods. "Tell me when he's done. Megatron was kicked out by Hell Beast so we might be able to take him out."

Prowl nods. "I'll tell him."
